Class oracle.html.List 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.CompoundItem
                   |
                   +----oracle.html.List
public class List
extends CompoundItem
Description:

The List class is the abstract base class for all List classes as specified in HTML2.

See Also:
Item, Container, DirectoryList, DefinitionList, MenuList, OrderedList, UnOrderedList

DEFINITION
DIRECTORY
MENU
ORDERED
UNORDERED

List()
List(int)
Creates an empty List object

toHTML()
Converts content of list object to HTML format.
toString()
Converts content of List object to string format.

List

  public String toHTML()
Converts content of list object to HTML format.
Item separator is "

    toHTML in class CompoundItem
    • toString 
      public String toString()
    Converts content of List object to string format.
    All items in the list are separated by a comma ","
